full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/29/2023 Form approved. Budget Bureau No. 43-R343. No. AFFIDAVIT OF WITNESS IN THE MATTER OF THE APPLICATION OF Maria Magdalena Matus } File No. AFFIDAVIT FOIA (b)(6) Dressmaker , occupation residing at FOIA (b) (6) (Number and street) (City or town) (State) (ZIP Code) being duly sworn, deposes and says that (s) he is is not a citizen of the United States of America; that (s)he has personally known and has been acquainted in the United States with Maria Madgalena Matus , the applicant above mentioned; that to his her personal knowledge the applicant has resided in the United States as follows: his Los Angeles, California from Aug. 1979 (City. town. and State) to Present (Month) (Year) Managua, Nicaragua (Month) (Year) from Jan 1950 (City. town. and State) to 1976 (Month) (Year) (Month) (Year) from (City. town. and State) to (Month) (Year) (Month) (Year) from (City. town. and State) to (Month) (Year) (Month) (Year) that (s)he is able to determine the date of the beginning of his her acquaintance with the applicant in the United States from the following fact(s): We were neighbors in Nicaragua. I came to live in the United States in 1976. We've kept in touch since and I have known that Mrs. Matus came to live in Los Angeles in August 1979. We ve kept in touch during this time and am now in Los Angeles visiting with her that (s)he has personal knowledge that the applicant is a person of good moral character, and that the longest period during the residence described in which (s)he has not seen the applicant is 11 (Years) (Months) giving me the opportunity to sign thi half. FOIA (b)(6) Subscribed and sworn to before me by the above-named witness at Los Angeles this 6th day of November 19 87 OFFICIAL SEAL SERGIO GALINDO Form 1-433 NOTARY PUBLIC . CALIFORNIA Sample UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT LOS ANGELES COUNTY (Signature of attestor) Immunstion and Naturalization My comm. expires SEP 27, 1991 (Rev. 10-2-78)N Notary Public (Title of attestor)
